# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This is a TypeScript to-do list application built using Atomic Design principles. The project structure follows:

## Atomic Design Structure:

- **Atoms**: Basic building blocks (buttons, inputs, checkboxes)
- **Molecules**: Simple groups of atoms (task item, task form)
- **Organisms**: Complex components (task list, header)
- **Templates**: Page layouts without content
- **Pages**: Complete pages with real content

## Key Guidelines:

- Use TypeScript for all components and logic
- Follow Atomic Design principles strictly
- Maintain consistent styling across components
- Use semantic HTML and accessibility best practices
- Implement type-safe interfaces for all data structures
- Include proper error handling and validation
